name: Javascript
description: JavaScript is a versatile programming language commonly used for web development to add interactivity and dynamic behavior to websites.

name: React
description: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces, known for its component-based architecture and efficient rendering

name: Flask
description: Flask is a lightweight Python web framework used for building web applications with simplicity and flexibility in mind.

name: Kubernetes
description: Docker is a platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers, providing an efficient and consistent environment across different computing environments.

name: Docker
description: Docker is a platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers, providing an efficient and consistent environment across different computing environments.

name: Debugging
description: Debugging is the process of identifying and resolving errors or issues in software code to ensure proper functionality and performance.

name: Ssh
description: SSH (Secure Shell) is a cryptographic network protocol used for securely accessing and managing remote servers over an unsecured network, allowing for encrypted communication and secure data transfer

name: Html5
description: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is the standard markup language used for creating and structuring web pages and web applications, defining the content and layout elements displayed in a browser.

name: Linux
description: Linux is an open-source operating system kernel that serves as the foundation for a wide range of Linux-based operating systems, known for its stability, security, and flexibility in various computing environments.

name: Nodejs
description: Node.js is a server-side JavaScript runtime environment that allows developers to build scalable, efficient, and networked applications, leveraging the JavaScript language for both frontend and backend development.

name: Git
description: Git is a distributed version control system widely used for tracking changes in source code during software development, facilitating collaboration among multiple developers and enabling efficient management of project revisions.

name: Rest Api
description: A REST API (Representational State Transfer Application Programming Interface) is a software architectural style for creating web services that enable communication between client and server through stateless operations using standard HTTP methods, typically used for building scalable and interoperable web applications.

name: Figma
description: Figma is a cloud-based design tool used for creating user interfaces, prototypes, and collaborative design projects, offering real-time collaboration features and cross-platform compatibility for designers and teams.

name: Mysql
description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) that uses Structured Query Language (SQL) to manage and manipulate data, commonly used for building web applications and storing structured data in various industries.

name: Nginx
description: Nginx is a high-performance, open-source web server and reverse proxy server known for its scalability, speed, and efficient handling of concurrent connections, often used to serve static content, cache data, and load balance web traffic.

name: Tailwind
description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that provides a set of pre-built, atomic CSS classes, enabling rapid and flexible styling of web applications by composing classes directly within HTML markup, emphasizing utility and ease of customization.

name: C
description: The C programming language is a powerful and versatile programming language known for its efficiency, flexibility, and portability, commonly used for system programming, developing operating systems, embedded systems, and various applications requiring high performance and low-level control over hardware resources

name: Regex
description: Regex, short for Regular Expression, is a powerful pattern-matching language used for searching, manipulating, and validating text based on specific patterns, enabling efficient string parsing and data extraction in various programming languages and applications.

name: Unittesting
description: Unittesting refers to the practice of testing individual units or components of software in isolation to verify their correctness and functionality, typically automated and focused on small units of code to ensure reliable and maintainable software.

name: Puppet
description: Puppet is a configuration management tool used for automating the provisioning, configuration, and management of IT infrastructure, enabling consistent and repeatable deployment of software and services across various environments, commonly used in DevOps practices for infrastructure as code (IaC)

name: Bash
description: Bash, short for "Bourne Again Shell," is a Unix shell and command language used for executing commands, scripting, and automating tasks in Unix-based operating systems, known for its powerful scripting capabilities and extensive use in system administration and development workflows.

name: Algorithms
description: Algorithms are step-by-step procedures or formulas for solving problems or performing tasks, often used in computer science and mathematics to define a set of instructions to achieve a desired outcome efficiently, encompassing a wide range of techniques such as searching, sorting, and optimization.

name: Web Security
description: Web security encompasses practices, tools, and techniques aimed at protecting websites and web applications from various threats and vulnerabilities, including but not limited to, cross-site scripting (XSS), SQL injection, cross-site request forgery (CSRF), and data breaches, ensuring the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of data and resources on the web.

name: Python
description: Python is a high-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability, widely used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, scientific computing, automation, and more, offering a vast ecosystem of libraries and frameworks for various applications.

name: Redis
description: Redis is an open-source, in-memory data structure store used as a database, cache, and message broker, known for its high performance, flexibility, and support for various data structures such as strings, hashes, lists, sets, and sorted sets, commonly used in applications requiring fast data access and low latency.

name: Css
description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation and layout of HTML documents, enabling developers to control the appearance of web pages by specifying styles such as colors, fonts, margins, and positioning, thereby enhancing the visual appeal and user experience of websites and web applications.

name: Mongodb
description: MongoDB is a NoSQL database management system that uses a document-oriented data model, enabling the storage and retrieval of data in flexible JSON-like documents, offering scalability, high performance, and support for distributed data architectures, commonly used in modern web applications and big data environments.

name: Server Configuration
description: Server configuration encompasses the setup and customization of software and hardware components to optimize performance and meet specific requirements for efficient server operation.

name: Express
description: Express.js is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for building web and mobile applications, facilitating the creation of APIs, routing, middleware, and handling HTTP requests and responses.
